html:
fierce king shall rule over them. An evil dictator will rule Egypt for a period of time. The fulfillment of this prophecy "may have been the 'Ethiopian' Pharaoh Piankhi (715), the conquests of Sargon II (cf. 20:1ff.) or Sennacherib, or the invasion and conquest of Egypt by Esarhaddon (680), Ashurbanipal (668), or the Persian Artaxerxes III Ochus (343)." Its fulfillment might also come in the future.

Lord of hosts. See commentary on 1:9.
